performer: suno pi toki pona (kala pona Tonyu, jan Kepe)
title: Opening | open
description:
Welcome to Toki Pona Day!

o kama pona tawa suno pi toki pona!

title: writing contest celebration! | utala musi pi pali lipu
description:
Let’s celebrate the amazing work of everyone who submitted to the writing contest. Tune in to hear people reading excerpts of their work on air, some elementary Toki Pona literature analysis, and the contest results!

utala musi pi tenpo poka la ale li pali e lipu pi pona mute e toki pi pona mute a! tenpo ni la o kute e ni: kulupu li kalama e lipu. kin la jan Lakuse li toki e nasin lipu pi toki pona! o kama sona e ni: kulupu la lipu seme en toki seme li pona nanpa wan!

title: jan Sepulon sings their songs live | jan Sepulon li kalama lon
description:
Singing my own songs (probably no covers due to copyright issues)

mi kalama uta e kalama musi mi. tan lawa jo la, mi kalama ala e kalama musi pi jan ante

title: music by jan Kepe | kalama musi pi jan Kepe
description:
some songs from my newest album!

kalama musi tan kulupu kalama sin mi!

title: toki pona kahoot! | musi Kahoot pi toki pona!

come join a fun game of kahoot about toki pona trivia and history!

sona sina li wawa ala wawa? o musi e musi Kahoot tawa sona pi toki pona, tawa sona pi tenpo pini!

description:

mi wile sona e nasin nimi pi jan ale. mi toki e wile sona pini mi.

title: Meetup updates | toki pi tenpo kulupu pi ma Amelika lete
description:
Discussing the organization and results of this year’s North America meetup.

mi toki e ni tawa jan: tenpo kulupu li seme? mi pali e seme lon tenpo ni? nasin seme la mi kama e ona?

title: sick of farming | jaki seme li lon ma
description:
toki pona adaptation of an episode from Escape This Podcast

nasa li lon ma. sina o alasa e sona. sina lukin li pali la mi toki e ijo tan lukin e kama tan pali.

title: Tutorial: Luka Pona Sign Language Basics | sona open pi luka pona
description:
LPSL (luka pona sign language) is the most popular sign language in the toki pona community. Curious about luka pona but don’t know where to start? This thirty-minute tutorial will show you the basics!

sina sona ala sona e luka pona? luka pona li toki luka pi toki pona tan kulupu pi toki luka. mi wile pana e sona tawa sina pi sona ala. o kama lukin la sina ken luka pona lili!

title: toki pona music by jan Kepi | kalama musi pi toki pona tan jan Kepi
description:
showing off a remastered version of the two songs i presented last sptp. might talk for a bit after about the music stuff, if i’m available

mi pana e kalama musi pi toki pona. mi pona e kalama mi pi sin ala tan suno pi toki pona lon tenpo sike pini. kalama li pini la, ken la, mi toki e kalama musi mi.

title: Let's Move with Laban Movement Analysis! | o tawa kepeken nasin Lapan!
description:
Practice your Toki Pona listening skills, learn about Laban Movement Analysis, and move around in a bunch of fun ways! This will be a toki pona taso lesson on a few basic ideas from Laban Movement Analysis, a system for describing human movement used in dance, theatre, voice acting, and more—and a chance to move around and be a little silly during the livestream.

o kute e toki pona, o kama sona e nasin Lapan, o tawa musi! ni li pana sona pi nasin Lapan. nasin Lapan li nasin pi sona tawa. jan musi mute li kepeken nasin ni—sina ken li ken sona! mi toki pona taso lon pana sona ni. sina ken kama sona, li ken tawa e sijelo sina lon tenpo pi ilo sona, li ken musi ^^

title: creativity!! | musi a
description:
music from my tp selection (maybe a new song if its finished - dont count on it) plus improvising for the audience. will be with my live guitar setup where i sing, play guitar, and play cajon and cabasa with foot drums

kalama musi mi li pona! kalama musi sin li pona. mi pali e musi sin. sina pona!

title: music by jan Kepe | kalama musi pi jan Kepe
description:
some songs from my newest album!

kalama musi tan kulupu kalama sin mi!

title: kalama sin podcast | kalama sin
description:
You can listen to the podcast ‘kalama sin’ on many platforms. It’s a small community project done exclusively in toki pona. On suno pi toki pona, tune in to a live edition with jan Deni, jan Luke, jan Tepo, and maybe others!

sina ken kute e ‘kalama sin’ lon ilo mute. kulupu lili li pali e kalama sin. suno pi toki pona la o kute e ni: jan Deni en jan Luke en jan Tepo en jan ante li kalama sin!

title: creativity!! (again) | musi a (tu)
description:
music from my tp selection (maybe a new song if its finished - dont count on it) plus improvising for the audience. will be with my live guitar setup where i sing, play guitar, and play cajon and cabasa with foot drums (all this but over again. will figure out what songs to play the night before.)

kalama musi mi li pona! kalama musi sin li pona. mi pali e musi sin. sina pona!

title: Rap in toki pona | nasin Wa pi kalama musi kepeken toki pona

description:

title: Surveying words | wile sona nimi
description:
Opening the annual word survey. Talking about past word surveys

title: How to Use Jargons in Toki Pona? nasin Lapan and more | toki pi nasin ante lon toki pona? nasin Lapan en sin
description:
Scientific, political, and similar sets of terminology are know to be a weak spot for Toki Pona, but is there a way to effectively use (at leas some) jargons in Toki Pona while still staying true to the language? In this conversational discussion, I’ll share some of the principles I used to translate the terminology of Laban Movement Analysis into Toki Pona, how these might apply more broadly, and the possible benefits of using Toki Pona in these situations. This will also serve as an English-language Q&A for those coming from o tawa kepeken nasin Lapan!

toki pona li ken ala toki e ale pi nasin sona ale, taso jan li ken ala ken toki pona e nasin ni? toki ni la, mi pana e sona mi li toki e pona pi ante toki ni. sina tawa lon “o tawa kepeken nasin Lapan!” la, o kama o pana e toki seme sina!

title: Tutorial: Luka Pona Sign Language Basics | sona open pi luka pona
description:
LPSL (luka pona sign language) is the most popular sign language in the toki pona community. Curious about luka pona but don’t know where to start? This thirty-minute tutorial will show you the basics!

sina sona ala sona e luka pona? luka pona li toki luka pi toki pona tan kulupu pi toki luka. mi wile pana e sona tawa sina pi sona ala. o kama lukin la sina ken luka pona lili!

title: Salvage the Spinach Bed: No-weeding garden technique! | nasin pali: o kipisi e kasi, o kama e kili!
description:
Maybe you’ve heard of no-dig gardening… now, try no weeding! This video will show you how to salvage a runaway vege garden with some shears and sheer willpower, all in Toki Pona.

jan mute li pali e ma kili la, ona li pana selo e ko ma mute. jan o kipisi o pana selo e kasi “ike” kin! ni la, ma pi kasi ike li ken kama sin ma kili. sitelen tawa ni la, jan Minasa li pana e sona pi nasin pali, kepeken toki pona.

title: Everything is Numbers (toki pona) | ale li nanpa (toki pona)
description:
You’ve heard before that everything could be numbers. Why is this? I’ll tell you!

tenpo la sina kute e nasin nasa: ale li ken nanpa. ni li tan seme? mi pana a e sona.

description:

title: The Return of kulupu pi toki musi | kama sin pi kulupu pi toki musi
description:
once, kulupu pi toki musi was a flourishing youtube channel, but one day it disappeared into oblivion… now, it has returned! what’s up?

tenpo pini la, kulupu pi toki musi li lon, li wawa. taso ona li weka lon sona ala… tenpo ni la, ona li kama sin! seme li lon?
